description: AlphaFold-like systems are rapidly expanding the scale of proteome structuring, and MineProt provides an effective solution for custom curation of these novel high-throughput data. It enables researchers to build their own server in simple steps, run almost out-of-the-box scripts to annotate and curate their proteins, analyze their data via a user-friendly online interface, and utilize plugins to extend the functionality of server. It is expected to support researcher productivity and facilitate data sharing in the new era of structural proteomics.

link.note: MineProt is included in the ELIXIR Research Data Management Kit as the recommended solution for building a dedicated web service for large-scale modelling efforts.

name: MineProt

metadata.abstract: AlphaFold-like systems are rapidly expanding the scale of proteome structuring, and MineProt provides an effective solution for custom curation of these novel high-throughput data. It enables researchers to build their own server in simple steps, run almost out-of-the-box scripts to annotate and curate their proteins, analyze their data via a user-friendly online interface, and utilize plugins to extend the functionality of server. It is expected to support researcher productivity and facilitate data sharing in the new era of structural proteomics. Database URL MineProt is open-source software available at https://github.com/huiwenke/MineProt.
metadata.title: MineProt: a stand-alone server for structural proteome curation
